mapper.select: SELECT channel, title, to_char(price,'999,999,999,999') price, seller, buyer, rdate, udate, seller_nik, buyer_nik, last_content, buyer_profile, seller_profile FROM CHAT WHERE buyer=#{buyer} or seller=#{seller} ORDER BY UDATE DESC
SELECT channel, title, price, receiver, sender, content, status, rdate FROM CHAT_SUB WHERE channel=#{channel}
SELECT channel, title, to_char(price,'999,999,999,999') price, seller, buyer FROM CHAT WHERE channel=#{channel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_SUB ( CHANNEL, TITLE, PRICE, RECEIVER, SENDER, CONTENT, RDATE ) VALUES ( #{channel}, #{title}, #{price}, #{receiver}, #{sender}, #{content}, sysdate )
UPDATE CHAT SET LAST_CONTENT = #{content}, UDATE = sysdate WHERE CHANNEL = #{channel}
